title: Window Shade, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: plain weave cotton
Technique: printed
inscribed: printed at bottom "D is", "235", and "Made in Italy"
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 205.5 x 107.5 cm (6 ft. 8 7/8 in. x 42 5/16 in.)
description: Fabric intended to be made up as a window shade. Design in the shape of an elongated oval showing a woman in a rural setting. Polychrome.

tombstone.epitaph:
Window Shade, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: plain weave cotton
Technique: printed. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-375.
